subPoints.message: If viewing on desktop, there is now a drawer component to the left of the screen to help with navigation
If viewing on mobile, navigation bar appears on bottom of screen

message: Added ability to delete album from album page
Fixed an issue with user dropdown in light mode
Resize sign in button for mobile

subPoints.message: Added error messages in the cases where username contains spaces or @
If Google sign-up process causes username to have spaces or @, remove spaces and replace @ with 'a'
Allow users to edit their user descriptions from Google sign-up page

message: Added some extra spacing between text areas on forms
General bug fixes to email sign-up process
Fixed a bug with the ordering of songs on album page
Fix an issue with the song visibility updating when album is edited but album visibility is not
Added separate page to check recent content
